runs.comm: and right away gets an edge through the vacant fourth slip area as Amjad played across to try and get this through midwicket
now strays on the pads as this is tucked away on the leg side to get Andri underway
pushes at this length delivery going across him, with the ball ending up at mid-off
tries to tickle away a single down fine leg to this leg-side delivery from the bowler. Ends up being called a wide

swings in a full delivery, outside of off, which shaped a great deal as this strikes the shoe of the batsman. Holder and the bowler deliberated as to whether to go for the review, but it looks like this might have struck outside of off, with the batsman attempting a clip through the leg side. Good result in the end there for WI as they opt to not go for it
delivers another full delivery from round the wicket which is defended away by the batsman
short and dug in as Amjad Ali ducks under it to let it go through
spears one down the leg side to get off to an indifferent start
has a flash at this fuller length outside of off, but the pace of the delivery beats him
lands one on a length outside of off as this straightens on the way to the keeper

and WI were almost into business there as the opener plays at this back of a length which leaves him from outside of off, with the ball bobbing over the slip to go through to the boundary at third man
Russell fumbles at cover and Holder isn't happy. It was pushed to him and Russell didn't get the body behind the ball, that should've been stopped
delivers another wide, this time outside of off
allows this back of a length to leave him and shape away from outside of off
big, big shout for lbw, but Amjad Ali got outside the line of off, as the bowler is not interested in pursuing the review. Good way to end the over for Holder
able to dab away a single through third man to get to the other end

continues from round the wicket as he pushes at this fuller length towards  cover, with the striker coming down the pitch initially to look for the run, before the man at short mid-off, came round to pick this up and fire in a throw at the striker's end. Would have been interesting had that struck
gets forward to this length delivery coming in from round the wicket
gets nice and low as he allowed this fuller length to go through outside his off stump
length delivery angling in from round the wicket as this is turned away towards deep square-leg
short of a length which is pulled away to the man at midwicket to end the over

and Holder has brought West Indies their first wicket with this length delivery which bounces i higher than Andri expected, as he looked to pull in the bat at the last moment, but this was able to glance the edge and go through to the keeper at a comfortable height. WI will need plenty more of this as they look to race against a cyclone here in Napier
delivers another back of a length beauty which is allowed to sail through to the keeper
pitches it up a touch, in the same channel, as this is left by the batsman
pokes at this length delivery angling in from outside off, with this one edged away to the man at gully
sensibly gets under this short ball which flies through at a middle-to-leg stump line
another short of a length, outside of off, which carries beautifully to the keeper
gets nicely behind this back of a length on middle and leg
full delivery going across him as this is steered away through the covers
fuller length which goes across the batsman as he attempted a drive through the covers, but is late on the ball
shortish length, going across, which is allowed through to the keeper
short ball that slants across Amjad as he weaved out of its way
mistimes this attempted drive through the covers to this fuller one going across, end the over
short of a length which is allowed to go through to the keeper

Holder is producing the goods with another magnificent back of a length which nips into the batsman from outside off, as he presented the blade. The extra bounce does him no disservice as this outside edge flies over to the first slip, who is able to get his mitts around it comfortably
able to fend away this short of a length going across him towards the off side

delivers a length delivery which bends in on middle and leg as the left-hand batsman played all around it. The batsman decides to take his chances as he goes for the review. The line looks good here on second viewing, the only question is height right now, but this showed to go on to hit the top of the stumps, so Amjad has to go
now fires in a fullish length which is tentatively played away through the leg side
Shaiman Anwar is tentatively forward and manages to get an inside edge to short midwicket. Very nervy batting
allows this back of a length to fly through to end a successful over for the West Indies
plays away at this back of a length going across him, but doesn't get it away very far on the off side
length delivery going across him which is allowed to whistle through
Khurram demonstrates his class with a lovely square drive that just races away to the boundary

played a fantastic shot the ball before, but is sent to the change room with this vicious inswinging yorker from Taylor that has him castled as he fell over. Wicked delivery there from Taylor, and Khurram has to go

full delivery going down middle and leg as this catches the leading edge of the bat as he attempted a clip through midwicket. Ends up flying over temporarily towards mid-on, but there were no fielders close enough to get at it. Really lucky break there for the UAE
full delivery which is driven away square off the wicket on the leg side
full delivery slanting in on off stump as this is respected by the batsman in equal batsman
sensibly allows this length delivery to fly through to the keeper outside of off
keeps all limbs and willow out of the way to this slightly back of a length whistling through outside off
short of a length which is fended away off the back foot
able to nudge away this back of a length onto the leg side
gets forward to this length delivery outside of off to end another probing over from the captain
works away this gentle length delivery on the pads through midwicket

cleans up the prolific Associate run-scorer with this length delivery which knocks back both middle and leg as Anwar played all around it. West Indies well on top and threatening to run over this UAE side with a bulldozer
back of a length on the stump which is defended to square-leg
has a go at this slightly back of a length outside off, with the ball beating him for pace
hard to call this a chance really as Javed pushed hard at this length delivery, offering a low drive close to the left hand of Taylor in his follow through
straying on the pads as this fuller one is flicked away to the man at long leg
shortish length, outside off, which is allowed to carry through to the keeper
pushes at this length delivery outside off, with the ball ending up near gully in the end
edges away this fullish length outside off, but this doesn't carry to any of the slips in the cordon
tucks away this shortish length on the on side
weaves away from this shortish length, now delivered outside of off, with this flying nearly head-height at the keeper
full delivery outside off which is worked away towards the point region
glances away uppishly to this short of a length on the pads. Ends up keeping him on strike for the next over. Probably ruing that last effort now
Javed decides to throw caution to the wind as he adds 1/6th more to the team's total with this colossal wallop over the long on boundary. Why not have fun, I suppose?
delivers a yorker on middle which is dug away by Javed towards the leg side. Excellent followup to the previous delivery
length delivery angling down the pads as this is helped away behind of square. Ends up being called leg bye though
another attempted yorker which is negotiated well in the end by Javed
length delivery, outside off, which is eased away to mid-off
fails to get in this yorker as he dishes a low full toss which is struck away towards midwicket
short of a length which is worked away for a single on the leg side
full delivery, swinging away outside off, as this is driven towards the mid-off region
pushes at this shortish length outside off, but only succeeds at picking out point
hooks away this short ball to the man at deep fine leg
length delivery, just outside off, which is defended away on the off side
has a half-hearted waft at this short of a length outside off, but is lucky for this not to take the edge over to the keeper
short of a length which is defended back towards the bowler
shortish length which the batsman attempts to flick away through square, but is late on it
shortish delivery, down the leg side, as the umpire calls a wide
pushes at this length delivery outside off towards the covers
now turns away this length delivery through fine leg to get off the strike, but called a leg bye in the end
negotiates away this back of a length outside his off stump towards mid-on
nicely behind the line of this back of a length on off stump
fullish length outside off which is caressed away through the covers, with the chasing fielder doing well in the end to track this back before the rope
gets in a good stride to this length delivery outside off
content to allow this back of a length to go through outside off
has a flash at this length delivery outside his off peg, but is late on the ball. Got some swing away as he played the stroke

Holder makes it four as he castles the top of off with this length delivery which nips back in off the seam. Has been a real captain's effort so far from the WI skipper, with drinks called onto the field
ends up bowling this shortish, leg-side delivery that brushes the pads of the batsman. Called a leg bye
short of length on the stumps which is defended away to square-leg
punches away this short of a length outside his off stump
looks to guide this one past backward point, with the misfield there allowing them the luxury of coming back for the second
pushes at this short of a length as the ball ends up at mid-off
spears in a fuller length which is fended away towards mid-on
back of a length, angling in, and defended with a nice, high elbow by the batsman
short of a length, outside off, which is bunted away by the batsman
bowls a short ball which goes off Amjad's shoulder as he looked to avoid the ball. Ball carries to Ramdin behind, but the half-hearted appeal did not convince the umpire
unleashes a back of a length delivery, but gets the line wrong, as this is tucked away comfortably on the on side
watchful outside his off stump to this length delivery from Holder

what happened here then? fullish length which appears to have caught the outside edge of the bat as it spooned over to the slip, who is unsure whether this had carried as he looked to the captain. The umpires are now having a look at it. Replays show this may have just carried, with the fingers looking to be under it. A closer angle suggets he may have grassed it, so with the lack of evidence though, the decision stays not out.
able to withdraw the blade to this short of a length delivery outside off
chips this overpitched delivery, angling in from outside off, but it wasn't very convincing as this lands in the deep at long off
short and wide of off as Javed cuts this away sublimely square off the wicket. Quite elegant as the balance was spot on
reaches over to defend this length delivery on and around off
short of a length delivery outside of off which is negotiated well
full delivery, coming in on off, as this is dug away towards mid-off
goes the heave over long off, but ends up playing outside the line of this one which jags in from a back of a length
goes after this length delivery on off, with this being sliced over to third man
fullish length which is squirted away towards backward point
elects to duck under this bumper delivered outside off stump
whips away this full delivery on the pads through square-leg
hooks away this fractionally short delivery, slanting down the pads, getting this away over to long leg, but not very convincingly
fuller delivery which is struck away towards cover to end the over
begins with a back of a length which is bunted away towards cover
looks to steer this one off the back foot to extra-cover, in the end getting the single he sought
able to get away this fullish length through fine leg for one
nicely behind the line of this back of a length on middle to leg
short ball which is carted away through midwicket
searching for the yorker, as Russell delivers a low, full toss which is struck sweetly through long on for a boundary
tries to drill away through the off side as the fielder in the ring keeps him honest
now gets away a bludgeon through backward square to get off the strike
length delivery, on leg, which is flicked away to deep backward square
some fortune for Aziz as he looked to hammer this length delivery over midwicket, but ends up getting a top-edge which flies over to the third man boundary
delivers a peach of a back of a length which straightens as the batsman presented the blade
fuller delivery, on middle and leg, which is defended away to end Holder's ten-over spell. is also the first bowler to bowl his entire quota on the trot. Of course, he is the captain
gets well under this short one from Russell
another bumper, this time quicker at 140 kph, as Javed is not at all interested to have a go
pushes out at this back of a length, as the ball rolls softly towards the covers
defended again off the back foot as West Indies search for another breakthrough
looks to slam this slower, short of a length out of Napier, but is early on the delivery
pitches it up now on middle and off as Russell is able to earn a maiden
dropped Holder, who has to be one of the tallest slips of all time, ends up making a mess of this edge from the bat that flew high to his left, as the ball burst through to continue through third man
looks to cut away this back of a length, but the ball carries over
Roach excited as he thought he had the batsman nicking this back of a length outside off, but the umpire is not interested
delivers a length delivery, outside off, which the batsman plays inside of
defends away this length delivery on off towards the bowler
gets away with this uppish edge through the vacant gully region as he gets to keep the strike next over
has a half-hearted go at this short of a length going across him, with the ball carrying through to the keeper
short of length delivery on the stumps which is turned to backward square leg
sends in the attempted yorker goes which becomes a low full toss as Aziz gets an inside edge onto pad
short of length delivery on the stumps which Aziz defends quite comfortably
short of length delivery outside off stump which is mistimed to point
splays one down the leg side as the umpire signals the scorer
tries to get away this hook through backward square, and is lucky for this not to fly over to the man at deep long leg
looks for the drive through long off, but ends up hitting more towards mid-on
content to defend this length delivery on off towards the off side
succeeds in getting an edge as he played with an angled face, with this one flying low to the right of second slip before beating the third man fielder to the rope
guides away this length delivery quite sweetly through long on, but not well enough for this to get to the rope. Has been a good fightback from the UAE for this seventh wicket
gets under this short ball from Roach outside off. WI won't threaten with these kind of lines though
now steers away a single through third man to keep the strike
looks for the old dab and run outside off, but is held by the close-in fielder
negotiates this short ball outside off as the ball lands close to him on the off side
ducks under this shorter one going down the leg side
another short one which Amjad is content to duck under as they look to hold out as long as possible
hangs on the back foot as Russell slips in a full length delivery which Javed is able to defend
now works away this fuller one on middle and leg towards the leg side to end the over
delivers a length delivery which is turned away softly on the leg side
fuller length which is nudged away on the leg side by the batsman
looks to bludgeon away this length delivery through the leg side, but ends up hitting it straighter to short mid-on
attacks this short ball to lift it high over square-leg to earn a boundary
was looking initially to hammer this back of a length over the covers, before aborting as he saw the slower ball come out
goes chasing after this wide, short length from Roach, but the umpire makes it easier as he calls a wide
short and pulled competently through midwickt as WI are losing the plot a bit here
full delivery on the pads which is helped away towards the leg side
backs to the leg side before crashing away this fullish delivery through the covers to bring up the 100 for the UAE
now eases away this back of a length delivery on the off side
now eases away this back of a length through the mid-on region for a comfortable single
pitched up now, on middle and leg, as this one is turned away towards the close-in fielder on the leg side
tries to get away this flick to this leg-side delivery, but is late on it
defends this flatter delivery outside of off
another one which is defended away by the batsman
gets in a stride to fend away this one drifting in from off
nicely on the back foot to help defend the bowler
once again on the front foot as this is defended back to the bowler
on the front foot to negotiate this final ball of Marlon's opening over
goes from round the wicket as he slants in this short of a length across the batsman
gets this one to bang in from round the wicket as Aziz played inside of the line
delivers one far too short as the umpire signals to the scorers
length on the pads which is nurdled away square off the wicket on the leg-side, with Marlon not doing well at the position there to put any pressure on the batsman
length delivery on middle and leg which is defended back towards the direction of the bowler
shortish length which is duck under by Javed, as these to continue to build a fighting total
squirts away this fullish length onto the off side to end the over
flights one in outside off as this is defended carefully by the batsman
now looks for the single through midwicket, which he is able to earn in the end
executes the drop single on the leg side to perfection to this one spinning in on off
turned away on the leg side
comes forward before easing this away to short mid-on
shuffles over to the off side just about getting away this paddle through fine leg. The batsmen are able to hustle hard to make it count for three
fuller length which is tickled away fine through the leg side
clips away this short of a length off the pads through fine leg
defends away this back of a length on and around leg
short of a length which is tapped over to the leg side by Aziz
content to bunt away this short of a length back towards the bowler
pulls away this short length through backward square, with Taylor doing well to get to this and stop the ball before the boundary
on the front foot to this one floated outside of off
drifted in on and around off as this is respected by the batsman
cuts away this slightly shorter length to find a boundary through the gap at third man
defends this one off the back foot
gets forward to this one sliding in from outside off
negotiates for any potential turn to end the over
steers away this back of a length through third man to get off the strike
slaps away this short of a length towards point
short ball, outside of off, which he drops his wrists too
back of a length, outside of off stump, as this is pushed away to point
gets away a fuller one with a slice down to third man
gets nicely behind the line of this back of a length to end the over
drifts one in outside off as this is defended away
punches away this one just outside off, but can't pick the vacant space
slides one in on middle and leg which has Sammy at slip running around to try and nab this in case he went fine. Holder appreciates the effort from the former captain
shortish and outside off stump as Javed mistimes the cut
just fends away this one drifting in outside off
lunges forward to neutralise the malice of this Marlon special on middle and off
short of a length which is run down to third man by Aziz. These two have been ticking over quite well, and have shown immense patience so far
looks to steer away the bowler through backward point, advancing down for the run, before deciding it wasn't worth the risk when he saw the close-in fielder coming through
slaps away this back of a length, but straight to the cover fielder
full delivery, on and around off, which is struck back to the bowler
cut away now through the cover region for one
nudges away a run through square-leg to end the 35th over as it is now time for the Batting Powerplay
defends this one tossed up outside off
on the back foot and defended away to the off side
content to work this one away softly on the off side
tries to force away a single through midwicket, but to no avail

now goes for the extravagant paddle through fine leg, which is able to have enough on it to reach the boundary. Aziz moves to 47 with that four. Holder guilty of letting this game stray away. Has looked to be quite content to wait for the mistakes, instead of forcing them
eases away this one tossed up towards the covers on the off side
begins with a poor, length delivery down the pads, which is tickled away fine for a boundary. Puts him with a big blow of a fifty here
now eases away this fuller one on the pads towards deep long leg
full delivery, on and around off, which is dug away towards the mid-on region

Aziz has enjoyed good fortune today, and this is another example of it, as he gets away this top-edge from this shortish length which flies over the keeper, but luckily for him, into the open space at fine leg

able to ease away this back of a length through backward square, as there was a moment of confusion whether he had reached the mark, before the run confirmation allowed him to remove his helmet and celebrate this milestone like he had scored a ton. Fair play to him though. He should enjoy his moment
tries to dab away a run through backward point, but fails to get it away in the end
flighted on off as this is negotiated carefully on the leg side
gets his front foot outside of the line as he fails to get away this slip. The WI fielders go up for the appeal, but it is not given
now steers away towards the leg side
once again content to defend on the on side
looks to force this past square-leg, but no can do
on the front foot to needle this away to the short mid-on fielder
delivers a yorker which Javed is able to get away through backward square in the end
short ball which Aziz pulls away, but only just, as he saw there was no one in the deep at cow corner. The ball ends up trickling over the rope in the end
now gets away an inside-edge to this attempted pull through midwicket, with the ball beating the deep fine leg fielder to the rope
fuller length delivery, on the pads, which is flicked away comfortably through long leg

overpitched, slower ball, which is scythed through the covers to bring up a maiden World Cup, and ODI, fifty. Also gets the two to their 100-run partnership as well. Really has been two special knocks from these two
content to just steer this one away outside off through third man to keep the strike
finding the boundaries at will now as this dragged length, outside of off, is cut away fiercely to deep point
looks to attack again outside off, but finds the cover fielder
on the front foot and defended with ease by the batsman
now steers away this slider down leg to pick out the man at square-leg
once again looks to force it away behind of square
tucked away off the back foot to end the over
attacks this back of a length outside off, but is late on the delivery
tries to cart away this short of a length, with the ball hit through the long on region in the end

and the breakthrough finally comes for West Indies as Javed was looking to just slam this length delivery over long on, but ends up getting a bottom-edge on this slower ball, with the ball crashing into the stumps. Javed gets a wonderful reception as he heads back to the dressing room. Excellent knock under pressure. Has it done enough though?
fires in a fuller one on middle and off which Naveed makes sure to get right behind of

well. Naveed decides he has had a good measure of the pitch as he just launches into this shortish length, to send this one high over deep midwicket for a 78m six. And that too, second ball. UAE, what did you have for breakfast?
edges away a steer towards third man to keep the strike
dabs this one quite beautifully through third man as the pair complete a brace
drifts one in on off which is blazed away uppishly through the covers. Looks like he has been sent with a mission here
tries to guide one away through third man, but is held by the fielder at gully
on the front foot and defended away to the off side
carts away this slightly dragged length through midwicket for a run
defended quite softly outside his off stump to end the over

Russell delivers again in this new spell as he shows the benefit of plugging away at those yorkers. Gets Naveed to play all around this one which hones in on leg stump. UAE now eight down, with WI looking to bundle them as soon as possible, especially with the eventual rain in the forecast for later
length delivery on off which is negotiated safely by the UAE captain
survives this other length delivery on and around off, but he didn't look very comfortably
once again content to just fend away this length delivery outside off
searches for the yorker, but gets this a bit too much on the leg side as Tauqir was able to dig it out
length delivery which is defended away towards mid-on to end a successful over for the West Indies
dabs away at this drifted ball from outside off, but can't get it through third man
now steps over to the off side to turn this away towards mid-on
turned away on the leg side towards the square-leg fielder

Aziz now has to go after his spirited effort as he chips this floated ball straight into the hands of Holder at cover, who takes it simply. UAE now nine down, but a wonderful applause for Aziz, who has really produced a special knock for his side. WI will be glad to see the back of him, but they also know they have let their foot of the gas here. Really bizarre from the WI
gives him a low full toss which he is able to ease away through long on
nicely behind this tossed up delivery on and around off
able to tuck away a single through backward square to this shortish length
ducks under this shorter one from the bowler on middle and leg

once again honing on the blockhole as this fuller one is dug away back towards the bowler, who is able to pick it up with one hand in his follow through, before trying to inflict the run out at the striker's end
drives this fuller one firmly towards the covers
drives this fuller one from Russell at the bowler on the bounce, with the ball going off his right hand over to the mid-on region
steers away this fullish length back towards the mid-on region to end the over
gets nicely behind this one drifted in from outside off
once again content to fend away this pitched up delivery towards the off side
flatter this time, from the bowler, but defended on the front foot
now carefully negotiates this slider on middle and leg to the on side
once again played softly on the leg side by the batsman
finishes his ten-over spell with a maiden as this round-the-wicket angle is defended away softly on the leg side
short ball on the leg stump which Guruge ducks under
fuller delivery which is driven back to the bowler
full and on the stumps as this is driven to the left of the bowler
slower ball outside off stump as Guruge swings hard, but gets an outside edge that goes to third man
sprays a full delivery down the leg side which is punished by the umpire
short of length delivery from Russell which Tauqir misses the flick to as the ball rolls off the thigh pad towards square leg
full and outside off stump as this one is driven to mid-off
begins with a length delivery outside of off which is driven away towards the cover region
steers away a single through to deep extra-cover as they look to survive the remaining overs
honing on the stumps with this full delivery, but ends up being struck away through third man to the man in the deep
and it is all over as Taylor beats Tauqir with this fuller length that goes off the front pad before crashing into the stumps
